Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm glad I made it to Goron City, but geez.<sp:5:0:0>
Who knew <clr:0000>fire-resistant clothes <clr:ffff>would be
so expensive?
My girlfriend's waiting for me at
Woodland Stable, so I have to make
my purchase and head back fast.
Otherwise she'll just say I was dragging
my feet again...
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm glad I made it to Goron City and that
the Gorons are all back to normal.

Geez though.<sp:5:0:0> Who knew <clr:0000>fire-resistant
clothes <clr:ffff>would be so expensive?

<sp:3:0:2:0300>My girlfriend's waiting for me at
Woodland Stable, so I have to make
my purchase and head back fast.
Otherwise she'll just say I was dragging
my feet again...
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I came here from very far away to buy
<clr:0000>fire-resistant clothes <clr:ffff>in <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>, but
it didn't work out.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I was expecting the temperatures to
be high—<sp:5:0:0>not the prices. Yeowch!

My girlfriend back at Woodland Stable
will be gutted to see me come home
empty-handed.
She always said I don't follow through
on things,<sp:5:0:0> and I don't want to prove
her right.<sp:0:4:0>On second thought, maybe I'll try to make
some rupees and come back.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal>Nice clothes, by the way. You look really—
<sp:5:1:0>wait a minute.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00>That thing you're wearing! That's it!
That's what I wanted to buy!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>It looks rugged! And a little bit old
fashioned, if I'm being honest?<sp:0:4:0>But that's what makes it GREAT! Now I
know I have to buy clothes like that!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've come from very far away to buy
<clr:0000>fire-resistant clothes <clr:ffff>in <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>My girlfriend is waiting for me back at
Woodland Stable, so I'm trying to make
it quick.
She always says I drag my feet...but I
won't this time!
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Phew... Might not have made it through
that without you.
Talk_12:

from <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>My girlfriend is waiting for those clothes
back at Woodland Stable, and I won't
let her down, not again!
SavedLv1_01: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>That was a close one... You saved me!
SavedLv2_00:

again!<sp:5:1:0> I sure owe you.

SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You...<sp:5:0:0>you can beat monsters like THAT?

Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The <clr:0000>fire-resistant clothes<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>
are just too expensive. I can't afford them.

My girlfriend, she's waiting for me at
Woodland Stable. She'll be gutted when I
come back empty-handed.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Maybe I should try cheering myself up at

Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease_01>Hey there! I'm glad to see someone out
here. <sp:5:0:0>It's been a long, lonely journey.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease_01>Hey there! Glad to see someone out here.<sp:5:0:0>
It's hard, braving the dark on my own.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Been a while since I saw another Hylian.
Around here, it's Gorons as far as the
eyes can see.
I'm en route to Goron City. I hear that's
the place to go if you want <clr:0000>fire-resistant
clothes<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Hopefully they're not too pricey.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>You came at the right time!<sp:5:1:0> I'm hopeless
on my own.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>I've never even heard of monsters like
this! Come on, we need to run!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm en route to Goron City. I hear that's
the place to go if you want <clr:0000>fire-resistant
clothes<clr:ffff>.
Hopefully they're not too pricey.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Travelers like us gotta keep marching
forward, day and night.<sp:0:4:0>Thank goodness it's safer here now, so
we can travel after dark without fear.
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired>I'm fine...<sp:5:0:0> Honestly, if disappointing my
girlfriend's a 10 on the pain scale, I'd give
that a six...
Ugh...<sp:5:0:0> OK, maybe a seven...
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Scare_00>My nicest clothes are going to be ruined
if this keeps up...
ComNakedCheck_W_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whoa!<sp:5:1:0> I can forgive a lot of fashion sins,
but not this one! Put something on before
you talk to me!
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ugh...<sp:5:0:0> My whole body hurts... I want to go
rest in a hot spring for a while...
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Travelers like us gotta keep marching
forward, day and night.<sp:0:4:0>Thank goodness it's safer out here now,
so we can travel at any time of day
without fear.
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>This is all I have to offer,<sp:5:0:0> but I want you to
have it. Consider it a thank-you.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I kept my girlfriend waiting, and now
I'm coming back to her without the
fire-resistant clothes.
She's not going to be happy. But it's not
my fault they're so expensive! Ugh...
This has really got me feeling down.
<sp:3:0:2:0300>Maybe I should try cheering myself up at
<clr:0000>Mine-Cart Land<clr:ffff>...
